sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; class ReserveCard extends Component { render() { const { reserve, getReserve } = this.props; return (

{/*

item :

{reserve.item}

Requester:

{reserve.requester}

Start Date:

{reserve.startdate}

Duration :

{reserve.duration}

Description:

{reserve.Comments}

*/} getReserve(reserve, true)} /> {/*
*/}
Item to do
Item Requester Start Date Duration Description
{reserve.item} {reserve.requester} {reserve.startdate} {reserve.duration} {reserve.Comments}
{/*
*/} ); } } export default ReserveCard;
